mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, Harriet Lane to Charles Macalester, February 12, 1862
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Johnston, Harriet Lane, 1830-1903
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Letter from Harriet Lane at Wheatland to Charles Macalester concerning mostly mutual acquaintances, friends, and family. The letter inquires after Lily Macalester Berghmans, Lane’s close friend. It is unclear if the letter is addressed to Lily Berghman’s father or brother, as both were named Charles Macalester.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Papers of Lily Macalester Berghmans Laughton
